paper_abstract: We generalize the inequality |P(z)|(2) + |P(-z)|(2) <= 1 ( Ref. 1) to the inequality |P(z(1), z(2))|(2) + |P(-z(1), z(2))|(2) + |P( z(1), -z(2))|(2) + |P(-z(1), -z(2))|(2) <= 1 in L-2( R-2); and construct compactly supported tight frames with good symmetry and dilation matrix 2I under the condition that both the low-pass filter and high-pass filters are unknown.
paper_title: Construction for a class of smooth tight frames in L-2(R-2)
